name: David Martin
text:
Pizza hut always has the best pizza around.
For covid dine in is closed off. ‚Ä¶More

name: Sarv Me
text: Ordered pizza on closing time. And got the order with a smile. Nice people and nice pizza.

name: Sasha
text: Quick Delivery service and always hot pizza. GOOD for those  Classic Pizza Hut Nights..

name: Kurtis Frost
text: If i could give negative stars i would we ordered a pizza and it was delivered 2 1/2 hours later stone cold  . Manager was nice tho but it shouldn‚Äôt have had to come to that

name: Andrew
text: If you're ordering it to The Beach might as well go get it yourself or plan to wait 45 extra minutes

name: Danielle Cashwell
text: Amazing staff, great food, quick service, absolutely the best pizza hut in the area, no doubt.

name: A Palande
text: Reached this place at 9:15pm. They close I think at 10:00. Very friendly staff. It was well kept.

name: Rob Saari
text: Not terrible if you want a quick dinner.

name: Zim Beeson
text: Terrible management and the food is mediocre. Go to dominos üòä

name: Debbie Carlson
text: Food took over 45 min. To arrive. 3 personal pans & breadsticks.  1 Other customer walked out after no service for 15 min.  No longer serving salad.  Cold dipping sauce for bread sticks.  Restaurant was empy at lunch time. Obviously the ‚Ä¶More

name: red reecer
text: Delivery to the office fast and very polite

name: Preston Stell
text: Pizza Hut has some of the cheapest pizza anywhere. Unfortunately it matches the price in quality as well. Very greasy and not greasy like you might want on a New York style pizza. Skip pizza hut guys....it's pizza hut. ‚Ä¶More

name: Zoms
text: Needs to work on customer service and ordered wings and they weren‚Äôt even sauced all the way. Bad time there. Didn‚Äôt make me feel welcome at all.

name: Jason isamu
text:
It's good for when your hungry and want a pizza fast!
I was only in this pizza hut one time and ordered a personal pizza that was fairly fast and didn't have to spend much money at all... It tasted good too!!

name: Rimas L
text: We ordered a pizza over the phone, and it normally takes about 20min or so to get ready. When we got to the restaurant about 20 min later to pick up our order the employee said, ‚ÄúOh We didn‚Äôt get any orders,‚Äù I‚Äôm not sure what they were ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Thompson
text: Nice staff, very quick, and I've never had a complaint about the pizza from here. Definitely a good location

name: M.E White
text: I've definitely had better

name: Cher Bruin
text: Respectfully, I Am Not Usually One To Complain Yet The Last Three Times I Have Ordered From Bridgman Pizza Hut, There Was Little, To No Sauce On The Pizza; The Restaurant, The Employee/Management Argued With Me & Did Not Offer To Make It ‚Ä¶More

name: Rio Wylde
text: Great staff clean and of course pizza!!

name: Levi Shipley
text: love that yall deliver to three oaks for me :)

name: Lysa Kohn
text: They're delivery time is awesome, because the food is never done all the way through.  Ordering a brownie that is still wet in the middle is not good. You can warm up the pizza but if you get the alfredo type sauce it is disgusting.  Delivery drivers are always very nice. So there's that.

name: Ben Clark
text: Incredibly long wait for our pizza. Took over two hours. By the time it got here the sun was already down.

name: Harry Fritz
text: Nice informal meeting place to get together in the evening with friends who are staying at the Bethel Park Campgrounds. The staff is very friendly and enjoys our visits.

name: Star Bush
text: Waited 50 mins, slow, got appetizers after meal.... Sad Sad Sad experience.. Food was barely warm..

name: Wanda Gerold
text: Love their boneless wings, and the service was great.

name: Syana Scott
text: Love it. Staff is friendly and outgoing. Takes less than 15 minutes to get fresh hot food

name: Hal Rockwell
text: Not so good got sick from the food

name: Sarah Flutterbye
text: Not impressed by Bridgman pizza hut. Need to work on better service and better portions on the salad for the money.

name: Nina B
text: Really great service. Nice staff members, and amazing food.

name: Jeremy Warren
text: The food is ok for a chain restaurant.

name: Shashank Hampalle
text: Good ambiance and service. People are friendly and polite.

name: JUDY SNAPP
text: Pizza is never cooked enough

name: jan smith
text: There are times when you walk in and there is no one to be seen. The servers text on their phones instead of waiting on the tables. The servers are busy socializing in the kitchen area instead of paying attion to their tables. Training is ‚Ä¶More

name: ted nitz
text: Worst service ever! Cheese bread was soggy and half cooked.pizza same in middle!

name: Emily Johnson
text: Salads are great, delivery is fast, and everyone is friendly. Pizza is great!

name: Michael Price
text: Nice place to get a quick pizza

name: James Mechelewski
text: I've only ever had good experiences at this location, but then I'm not a crotchety old weirdo that goes looking for reasons to complain. Real fast delivery!

name: Christine Holbrook
text: Really good place to eat

name: William Gerold
text: Love their crust on their pan

name: Lorin Acree
text: Always good people good service

name: Emma Oberdick
text: The server was NOT helpful at all. Manager decided to watch the Hawks game rather than tend to waiting tables. Took 45 minutes to get our extremely burnt cheesey bread. Waitress asked for tip before we were finished. Terrible service.

name: Joel Gregory
text: This Pizza Hut is setting the standard! Never a disappointment.

name: Ken Hirst
text: No lunch buffet at this location, but good pizza hut food.

name: JASON Hacko
text: Pizza and service was very good

name: Rich Siri
text: I stood at the counter while the staff ignored me for a couple of minutes. There were three people behind the counter who had all made eye contact but would not acknowledge that we were waiting for something.  We were just trying to get a seat.

name: Christopher Bryant
text: Pretty delicious!

name: heath Tyler
text: Too long of a wait

name: Valerie Merkling
text: Yummy

name: Tex Helms
text: Prices are way too high.

name: Isaac Helmuth
text: Shame that there is not a buffet at this franchise.

name: Chuche Lopez
text: Good service.

name: Rosemary Gracia
text: If i could rate it a 0 i would because everyone is so slow

name: Kyle Collatz
text: Good pizza as pizza hut does.

name: Allen Tomes
text: Cmon people

name: Jim Hurst
text: Meh...standard mediocrity...but consistent.
